channel.title: Detour on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Detour on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-395 South at CA-182
item.description: US-395 south at CA-182 in Bridgeport. When this picture was taken, US-395 was closed in the evenings north of Bridgeport, so northbound US-395 traffic had to use CA-182 to reach Reno and Carson City, hence the orange directional signs.

item.title: OR-234 West at OR-99 - I-5 Detour
item.description: OR-234 west at OR-99 in downtown Gold Hill. There was a detour in place for I-5 when this was taken, because of construction on the I-5 ramp on the west side of Gold Hill.
